entry.title: Sunday night: A few flurries. Low minus 8.
entry.summary: Cloudy. A few flurries beginning this evening. Wind becoming east 20 km/h early this evening. Low minus 8. Wind chill minus 6 this evening and minus 15 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Sunday 16 April 2023
